content:
Hello,

at University of Rome "Tor Vergata" we will hire an associate professor in mathematical logic. There is still not a job opening but we would like to hear from people potentially interested in the position by March 25, 2024. The official requirements are

  • Research experience and publications in the field of Mathematical Logic.
  • Competence in teaching Mathematical Logic courses at the university level.
    https://www.mat.uniroma2.it/interesse.php

I will not be in the hiring committee but am in the program committee, where a general direction of hiring is discussed.
